entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
